code: export const getAllFoodsReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{foods:[]};let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'GET_FOODS_REQUEST':return{loading:true,...state};case'GET_FOODS_SUCCESS':return{loading:false,foods:action.payload};case'GET_FOODS_FAILED':return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};export const addFoodReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'ADD_FOOD_REQUEST':return{loading:true,...state};case'ADD_FOOD_SUCCESS':return{loading:false,success:true};case'ADD_FOOD_FAILED':return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};export const getFoodByIdReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'GET_FOODBYID_REQUEST':return{loading:true,...state};case'GET_FOODBYID_SUCCESS':return{loading:false,food:action.payload};case'GET_FOODBYID_FAILED':return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};export const editFoodReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'EDIT_FOOD_REQUEST':return{editloading:true,...state};case'EDIT_FOOD_SUCCESS':return{editloading:false,editsuccess:true};case'EDIT_FOOD_FAILED':return{editloading:false,editerror:action.payload};default:return state;}};
